TITLE: Enabling Crate Features in Rust
DESCRIPTION: This code snippet demonstrates how to enable optional features when using the Rand crate in a Rust project. It shows the default features and additional configurable options.
SOURCE: https://github.com/rust-random/rand/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: rust
CODE:
```
// Default features:
// std, alloc, os_rng, std_rng, small_rng

// Optional dependencies:
// log

// Configuration features:
// nightly, simd_support, unbiased

// Example usage in Cargo.toml:
// [dependencies]
// rand = { version = "0.9", features = ["log", "simd_support"] }
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Specifying Rand Core Dependency in Cargo.toml
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to include the rand_core dependency in a Rust project's Cargo.toml file. This snippet specifies version 0.9.3 of the library.
SOURCE: https://github.com/rust-random/rand/blob/master/rand_core/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: toml
CODE:
```
rand_core = "0.9.3"
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Using Iterator-Based Collection Generation in Rust's rand Crate
DESCRIPTION: Example of the new recommended way to generate random vectors after the removal of Rng::gen_vec(). This approach uses iterator methods to create collections of random values.
SOURCE: https://github.com/rust-random/rand/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-22_snippet_10

LANGUAGE: rust
CODE:
```
rng.gen_iter().take(n).collect()
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Generating Random ASCII Strings in Rust's rand Crate
DESCRIPTION: The replacement pattern for generating random ASCII strings after the removal of Rng::gen_ascii_str(). This uses character iterators with collection.
SOURCE: https://github.com/rust-random/rand/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-22_snippet_11

LANGUAGE: rust
CODE:
```
rng.gen_ascii_chars().take(n).collect()
```

LANGUAGE: Rust

IteratorRandom::choose_stable
```

```

TITLE: Feature Flag Example
DESCRIPTION: Shows the syntax for enabling and managing feature flags in the Rust Random library
SOURCE: https://github.com/rust-random/rand/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: rust
CODE:

"serde" // Renamed from serde1
"os_rng" // Renamed from getrandom
"thread_rng" // New feature
```

## [0.9.0] - 2025-01-27
### Dependencies and features
- Update to `rand_core` v0.9.0 (#1558)
- Rename feature `serde1` to `serde` (#1477)
- Rename feature `getrandom` to `os_rng` (#1537)

### Other changes
- Add `Lcg128CmDxsm64` generator compatible with NumPy's `PCG64DXSM` (#1202)
- Add examples for initializing the RNGs (#1352)
- Revise crate docs (#1454)
```

TITLE: Markdown Changelog Documentation
DESCRIPTION: Structured changelog following Keep a Changelog format and Semantic Versioning. Documents changes from version 0.1.0 through 0.9.0, including feature updates, dependency changes, and bug fixes.
SOURCE: https://github.com/rust-random/rand/blob/master/rand_chacha/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
# Changelog
All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](http://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/)
and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html).

## [0.9.0] - 2025-01-27
### Dependencies and features
- Update to `rand_core` v0.9.0 (#1558)
- Feature `std` now implies feature `rand_core/std` (#1153)
- Rename feature `serde1` to `serde` (#1477)
- Rename feature `getrandom` to `os_rng` (#1537)

### Other changes
- Remove usage of `unsafe` in `fn generate` (#1181) then optimise for AVX2 (~4-7%) (#1192)
- Revise crate docs (#1454)

## [0.3.1] - 2021-06-09
- add getters corresponding to existing setters: `get_seed`, `get_stream` (#1124)
- add serde support, gated by the `serde1` feature (#1124)
- ensure expected layout via `repr(transparent)` (#1120)

## [0.3.0] - 2020-12-08
- Bump `rand_core` version to 0.6.0
- Bump MSRV to 1.36 (#1011)
- Remove usage of deprecated feature "simd" of `ppv-lite86` (#979), then revert
  this change (#1023) since SIMD is only enabled by default from `ppv-lite86 v0.2.10`
- impl PartialEq+Eq for ChaChaXRng and ChaChaXCore (#979)
- Fix panic on block counter wrap that was occurring in debug builds (#980)

## [0.2.2] - 2020-03-09
- Integrate `c2-chacha`, reducing dependency count (#931)
- Add CryptoRng to ChaChaXCore (#944)

## [0.2.1] - 2019-07-22
- Force enable the `simd` feature of `c2-chacha` (#845)

## [0.2.0] - 2019-06-06
- Rewrite based on the much faster `c2-chacha` crate (#789)

## [0.1.1] - 2019-01-04
- Disable `i128` and `u128` if the `target_os` is `emscripten` (#671: work-around Emscripten limitation)
- Update readme and doc links

## [0.1.0] - 2018-10-17
- Pulled out of the Rand crate
```
